Na.description: Sodium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide, as are attributes 4-10)

Mg.description: Magnesium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Al.description: Aluminium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Si.description: Silicon (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

K.description: Potassium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Ca.description: Calcium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Ba.description: Barium (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Fe.description: Iron (unit: weight percent in corresponding oxide)

Type of glass.description: Glass type (class attribute) -- 1 building_windows_float_processed, 2 building_windows_non_float_processed, 3 vehicle_windows_float_processed, 4 vehicle_windows_non_float_processed (none in this database), 5 containers, 6 tableware, 7 headlamps

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in material science and glass identification.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the glass, please predict the type of glass.
prompt.answer_prompt: Building windows float processed[0], Building windows non-float processed[1], Vehicle windows float processed[2], Containers[3], Tableware[4], or Headlamps[5]?
